channel.title: Not saving my intro message
channel.description:
ok when i go into client on my cheezscape 80 and chage the help menu thing and then save and exit and click the complier and then run server it dont have the changes i made???
ps:newb language prefered!

item.title: Not saving my intro message
item.dc:creator: @rbb138 rbb138
item.description:
@rbb138 wrote:

… i done that ages ago…

i got latest java update 10 and it works fine but never saves…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 02:59:31 PM[/size][hr]any1 help me…
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 03:26:18 PM[/size][hr]i got java runtime 5.0 update 10

but do i need a java development kit???

if so were can i get one?

Read full topic

item.title: Not saving my intro message
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

[insert crying here]

Change the path to you’re version of jdk. If you right click the compiler, and go to edit, it will say something like

“C:\program_files\java\jdk_1.5.6”

If you go to:

  1. Start
  2. Run
    3 Type in “C:\program files\java”

and find what version of JDK you have (e.g 1.5.6)

Change the compiler to use that version =-) That should fix it I think.

Read full topic

is that normal
it has said that on all the cheezscapes sources iv had (crashed about 3)
